import React from 'react'; import {default as CheckoutItem} from './../../checkout-item/checkout-item.container'; import StripeCheckoutButton from './../../stripe-button/stripe-button.component'; import { CheckoutPageContainer, CheckoutHeaderContainer, HeaderBlockContainer, TotalContainer, WarningContainer } from './checkout.styles'; const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) => ( Product Description Quantity Price Remove { cartItems.map(cartItem => ( )) } TOTAL: ${total} *Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/22 - CVV:123 ); export default CheckoutPage;
